channel.title: RUSTPROP
channel.description: Political messaging with varying degrees of importance, designed by Dana 'Rusty' Teagle, the toronto public libra

item.title: Liberation will require seizing the means of computation. Until we own the servers there are no safe havens in cyberspace.
item.description: personally I don't believe marginalized groups will ever find a corporate-owned platform that is "safe" or "protects them" so long as it is politically accepted and/or profitable to do otherwise

item.title: Resist the urge for a quick fix to your problems. Progress requires labour & commitment.
item.description: you have to build your life brick by brick

item.title: 7 NYE reminders from Rusty: 1. Drink lots of water. 2. Fully charge your phone. 3. Generously tip servers/bartenders. 4. Carry naloxone with you. 5. Don't go out if you're sick. 6. Wear a mask when possible. 7. Make a plan for getting home. Bless y'all and happy new year.
item.description: bless y'all, happy new year, thanks for the support in 2024, take care of one another now ya hear?

item.title: Women are a really great part of being alive.
item.description: rusty's in her gratitude era

item.title: Feeling hope & staying informed are not mutually exclusive.
item.description: ignorance and inaction will not save you nor cure your despair. hope is found in recognizing that my struggle is your struggle is their struggle is our struggle, and that we exist in a lineage that ends with liberation.

item.title: What parts of your humanity are you conceding when you refuse to speak up about injustice? Land back and an end to occupation from Turtle Island to Palestine.
item.description: land back and an end to occupation from turtle island to palestine

item.title: Incredibly rude of summer to be this fucking hot when I want to be outside right now. It's too fucking hot and I am so sleepy.
item.description: this is a call out post directed at the summer (feat. snufkin the cat)

item.title: Having a bit of a brat summer but in the way that I'm cranky and sleepy and I keep not finishing my dinner.
item.description: sorry that I took like two weeks off and then I come back with something this low-effort but I am in my aforementioned brat summer so please don't be mad at me

item.title: If the sky ever looks like this it's a sign that you should become a transsexual.
item.description: huh... the more you know

item.title: Every movie ever made could be improved with more gay kissing.
item.description: and yr not allowed to argue with me because it's pride month

item.title: I really hate touchscreens. My hands hurt all the time. Phones should have buttons. This is what they took from us.
item.description: I yearn for the feeling of clunky buttons under my fingertips once again

item.title: Sorry. I really am trying to apologize less. I'll do better I promise.
item.description: plz don't be mad at me

item.title: Queer/trans liberation and police abolition and anti-colonialism and anti-capitalism and land back go hand in hand in hand in hand in hand. None of us are free until all of us are free.
item.description: all of our liberation is inextricably intertwined. there is no pride in policing. there is no pride in genocide. land back now. corporations are not your ally. uplift trans women of colour while they are alive. free palestine and free sudan and free congo and free every oppressed peoples from the tyranny of colonial white supremacist ideology and extraction. queer/trans liberation cannot be divorced from class struggle and don't you forget it.

item.title: As much as I love finding out what my comrades on the TTC are listening to... Maybe you should wear headphones today, pal.
item.description: unless yr blasting 'brat' (2024) by charli xcx of course

item.title: If you don't own the content the content will own you. Streaming sucks. Buy physical media.
item.description: they reinvented cable but made it more expensive and less convenient

item.title: We really need fewer girlbosses and more girlunions.
item.description: and before you askâ€”girlpoliceunions don't count

item.title: Hey does anyone know who lives in that one weird modern house on the street? I just wanna know what their whole deal is.
item.description: I'm not afraid to ask the questions on everyone's minds

item.title: Push notifications were a mistake. Websites shouldn't be trying to talk to me when I'm not even looking at them.
item.description: hey does anyone else ever wonder if maybe our phone apps are just lonely and bad at picking up on social cues?

item.title: Flowers are for smelling. Just stop for a second. You're 'too busy'? Fuck off.
item.description: stop scrolling for a sec and stick yr nose in a rose
